    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    PoolableConnection
    A delegating connection that, rather than closing the underlying connection, returns itself to an ObjectPool when closed.
    class 
    PoolingConnection
    A DelegatingConnection that pools PreparedStatements.
